channel.title: 2006Remade - A 2006 Remake!
channel.description:
Hello people, a LONG time before, when 2006Scape just got shutdown. Me and Mod Tom (or Tom Doyle) were creating this 2006 remake! Just me and him. After awhile it became moderately popular and he hired more qualified people, and ofcourse, fired me. However since before it had all those other qualified people, we were developing through DropBox. My DropBox to be specific, and I still have a very early version of the source and client (only a few quests added). To this surprise I started getting passionate into server developing again, and realised how 2007 Runescape is going to change pretty soon. Long story short I am developing the server again! The original thread which Tom Doyle posted: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/advertise/476026-2006remade-2006-runescape-remake.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/advertise/476026-2006remade-2006-runescape-remake.html[/url]
Website: [url=http://2006remade.ifhost.net/index.php]http://2006remade.ifhost.net/index.php[/url]
Note: This is going to be a FULL 2006 server, but at the time of the source and client we were just almost opening it up to the public for Pre-Alpha. So maybe next week or even TOMORROW depending on how fast I develop it. [SPOILER] [i]What we've done so far[/i]
Perfect Combat(Melee, Range, Magic) PvP fully complete PvN fully complete X-logging Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Every weapon special attack Barrow Effects Added Equipment requirements Degradable equipment Weapon poisoning
Skills Agility Slayer Cooking Crafting Farming Firemaking Fishing Fletching Herblore Mining Prayer Runecrafting Smithing Thieving Woodcutting
Minigames Barrows Duel Arena Castle Wars Pest Control Tzhaar Caves Fight Pits
Music/Sounds Region Music Music Fading Music Player Music Unlocking Game Sounds
Quests/Miniquests *MINIQUESTS*
*FREE TO PLAY*
*MEMBERS*
Random Events Freaky Forester Evil Bobs Island Genie Sandwich Lady Shade Spirit Tree Zombie River Troll Evil Chicken Rock golem
Miscellaneous Correct Skill Interfaces Npc Force Chat Crystal Chest Sinister Chest Repairing Barrows / Axes & Pics Camelot Party room All Global Spawns All Runescape Shops With Prices Decanting All Fillables All Pickables Drinking General Store Price Depending On Stock [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3958287/2006Remade_cooks_ass.png[/img]

item.title: 2006Remade - A 2006 Remake!
item.dc:creator: @2006Remade 2006Remade
item.description:
@2006Remade wrote:

Hello people, a LONG time before, when 2006Scape just got shutdown. Me and Mod Tom (or Tom Doyle) were creating this 2006 remake! Just me and him. After awhile it became moderately popular and he hired more qualified people, and ofcourse, fired me.
However since before it had all those other qualified people, we were developing through DropBox. My DropBox to be specific, and I still have a very early version of the source and client (only a few quests added). To this surprise I started getting passionate into server developing again, and realised how 2007 Runescape is going to change pretty soon. Long story short I am developing the server again!
The original thread which Tom Doyle posted: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/advertise/476026-2006remade-2006-runescape-remake.html

Website: http://2006remade.ifhost.net/index.php

Note: This is going to be a FULL 2006 server, but at the time of the source and client we were just almost opening it up to the public for Pre-Alpha.
So maybe next week or even TOMORROW depending on how fast I develop it.
[SPOILER]
What weâ€™ve done so far
